zh.title: 教皇约翰·保罗一世逝世
澳大利亚赢得美洲杯帆船赛
苏联与叙利亚签署友好合作条约
林纳斯·托瓦兹发布Linux内核
爱沙尼亚渡轮“爱沙尼亚”号沉没
中国首次载人航天飞行成功
中国石家庄三鹿奶粉事件爆发
印尼苏拉威西岛发生强烈地震海啸

en.title: Air Canada Flight 189 crashed in Toronto, killing two.
Ben Johnson stripped of Olympic gold medal for doping.
Linus Torvalds announced the first version of Linux.
The ferry Estonia sank in the Baltic Sea, killing 852 people.
The Defense of Marriage Act (DOMA) was signed into law in the US.
The Second Intifada began following Ariel Sharon's visit to Temple Mount.
Blackout hits Italy, causing widespread disruption.
Dow Jones suffered its largest one-day point drop ever.
Palau became the first country to ban sunscreen to protect coral reefs.
